project.title: KPopZStation
project.subtitle: A website dedicated to facilitating the purchase of music albums, specializing in Korean music, including K-pop.

project.title: GoVege
project.subtitle: A website exclusively designed for ordering vegan and vegetarian meals, offering a wide variety of plant-based dishes.

project.title: Allos
project.subtitle: An Android-based application designed to scan barcodes on packaged food to check if the product contains allergens specific to the user's profile.

project.title: DogSOS
project.subtitle: An iOS emergency application that connects users directly with the nearest veterinarian during pet emergencies.

project.title: Pirates Adventure
project.subtitle: An iPadOS-based puzzle game featuring unique gameplay mechanics.

project.title: CaffeineTracker
project.subtitle: A watchOS application designed to track caffeine consumption, seamlessly integrated with HealthKit.

project.title: Cerdikiawan
project.subtitle: An iPadOS-based educational app designed for children, offering engaging and enjoyable learning experiences through gamification.

project.title: Wearther
project.subtitle: An iOS weather app that provides personalized clothing recommendations based on the current weather at your location and your destination.

project.title: SilentEchoes
project.subtitle: An iPadOS-based game that tells the story of a deaf individual facing bullying from their peers.

project.title: DuaKomaLima
project.subtitle: An iOS-based zakat application designed to simplify the process of fulfilling zakat obligations.
